message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $12,000 represents the true value of this product, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $9,800, but no higher than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
